title: Retail Lead
description: Lead a team of 250 staff, manage people, resolve any issues between staff and/or customers
Conduct recruitment interviews for potential candidates
Scheduling and assigning staff duties for the day
Visual merchandising, setting up displays to enhance customer experience

title: Administrative Assistant
description: Opening all registers for the business day with correct starting float
Analyze previous day's sales reports and manually adjust any tills that were closed with incorrect cash amounts
Banking all sale money into sale safes (CAD and USD)

title: Supervisor/Sales Coach
description: Introduce and teach all new hires that come into the store (how to work at the store, daily routines)
Lead a department of 10-15 people to ensure staff are following proper routines and help the business succeed
Scheduling and assigning staff duties for the day
Analyze sales reports and strategize ideas to help business increase sales
Close registers at the end of the night (depositing all money, entering final cash amounts)
